data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mozaffarian, Fariba, Wilson, Michael R. (2015): The aphrophorid spittlebugs of Iran (Hemiptera: Cercopoidea: Aphrophoridae). Zootaxa 4052 (4): 442-456, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4052.4.2
